marcus_enters.speaker: Narrator
marcus_enters.text: Marcus has become a regular sight at the cafe. Today, he settles into his usual corner seat.

marcus_greets.speaker: Marcus
marcus_greets.text: Ah, the cafe keeper. I find myself returning here more often than I planned. There's something about this place.

warm_response.speaker: Marcus
warm_response.text: *A rare smile crosses his face* Thank you. It's been a long time since anywhere felt like... home.

usual_order.speaker: Marcus
usual_order.text: You know me well already. Yes, the Traveler's Stew, if you please.

marcus_reflects.speaker: Marcus
marcus_reflects.text: You know, I've been thinking... maybe wandering isn't all there is. Maybe some places are worth staying for.

end_scene.speaker: Narrator
end_scene.text: Marcus seems more at ease each time he visits. Perhaps his wandering days are finally coming to an end.
